By  Carlos GalvezMarch  

Before the fall semester Douglas Hall will be demolished and students will have to look to other residence halls for housing PERIOD

The closing of Douglas Hall is a part of NIU President Doug Bakers Master Plan Thesis designed to create a new campus said NIU spokesman Paul Palian PERIOD

Bill Nicklas vice president of Public Safety and Community Relations said Douglas furniture will be salvaged and the hall demolished prior to the  academic year and Lucinda Drive will be extended to provide easier access and navigation PERIOD

Douglas Hall is one of the original 1960s large residence halls Nicklas said PERIOD Its not inviting and its old. housing and Dining sent letters to the residents of Douglas Hall March  informing them of the closing of the hall PERIOD Starting  a.m PERIOD March  students who lived in Douglas were given another chance to choose a room in a different residence hall PERIOD

Palian said Douglas Halls closing is only one part of the change for NIUs future PERIOD

There are some things that can be done immediately and other things that are down the road but Douglas Hall is the first step Palian said PERIOD

Palian said he also hopes people attend Bold Futures Workshops so they provide input on their opinions and ideas about changes around NIU PERIOD

Nicklas said students shouldnt think of the hall closing as a dilemma but as an opportunity to look for more halls to live in and attend programs in the center of campus PERIOD

Angel Martinez freshman prephysical therapy major said he isnt too worried about the closing PERIOD

Im moving to New Hall and Im worried about money but I know financial aid will help Martinez said PERIOD

Douglas holds the lowest rates with  for a threeroom bedroom according to  rates PERIOD Neptune and Douglas are tied for the lowest rates of  for a double room PERIOD Rates for the  academic year show Neptune will have the lowest rate at  for a double room PERIOD

Laria Serrano freshman political science major said she chose Douglas because she didnt prefer any other hall and it was cheap PERIOD

Im gonna miss the people here but I knew eventually the building would close Serrano said PERIOD
